name: Travel in Space
description:
Premise: This is a spaceship simulation game, called Travel in Space. Player can drive his spaceship to walk around this space area and see what happen in the space.

Controls:  "W"- move forward |  "S"- move backward |  "A" / "D" - adjust angle |  "E" - pick up item|  "Q" - drop item |  "R" - reload the game |  "Esc" - quit the game 

Things To Do: Player can pick up the item to strength himself, and player can get close to the planet and see what happen.
